<static> request_pointerlock(elem, enabled_cb, disabled_cb, mouse_move_cb, check_mouse_control)

Request pointer lock mode. Security issues: execute by user event.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
elem Element
enabled_cb <optional>
 Enabled callback
disabled_cb <optional>
 Disabled callback

 Mouse movement event callback

 Check mouse control
